message: I have a great product that I think you'll love, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but $100 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $60.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $90.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $75.
I'm not willing to go as low as $75, but I can try to find some flexibility. I'm willing to offer it to you for $85.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $85 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $78.
I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $82, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I think we're really close now, but I'm still a bit short. I was thinking more along the lines of $79.
I'm willing to meet you at $80, which is the minimum I need to make a profit. I'm not willing to go any lower than this.
